wiki.content:
Drake hit us again by the latest single, Forever. The song features verses by rappers Kanye West, Lil Wayne and Eminem. This song was written by Kanye West and released as a single from soundtrack to LeBron James’s More Than a Game documentary.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: Drake hit us again by the latest single, Forever. The song features verses by rappers Kanye West, Lil Wayne and Eminem. This song was written by Kanye West and released as a single from soundtrack to LeBron James’s More Than a Game documentary.
